title: Truck Hero's Reminder: Exceeding Their Budgeted Demand (Audio)
itunes:title: Truck Hero's Reminder: Exceeding Their Budgeted Demand (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Truck Hero CEO, Bill Reminder, on opportunities in the $14 billion pickup truck accessories market, and timing for a potential IPO following last year's postponed offering.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
